mapper.select: SELECT name name, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT content) AS content FROM ( SELECT pc.name,pcd.content FROM policy_category_data pcd JOIN policy_category pc ON pcd.policy_category_id=pc.id) AS b GROUP BY name
select company_name name,hobby content,update_date update_date from company where id=#{companyId}

SELECT p.*, CONCAT('剩余',DATEDIFF(COALESCE(p.expire_date,'2099-12-30'),p.publish_date),'天')shengyuTime, p.file_url policyFileUrl,p.money money,p.source source, pc.e_name AS e_name,pcd.content as category_content,p.created_at as createdAt FROM policy p left join policy_properties_data ppd on p.id = ppd.policy_id left join policy_category_data pcd on ppd.policy_category_data_id = pcd.id left join policy_category pc on pcd.policy_category_id = pc.id where p.is_custom is null order by p.id,pc.id
select pcd.id id, pc.name name,pcd.content from policy_category pc join policy_category_data pcd on pc.id = pcd.policy_category_id
